verses.verse: וַיְהִ֤י <WH1961> vay-Hi were allotted הַגּוֹרָל֙ <WH1486> hag-go-Ral There was also a lot לְמַטֵּ֣ה <WH4294> le-mat-Teh for the tribe מְנַשֶּׁ֔ה <WH4519> me-nash-Sheh, of Manasseh כִּי־ <WH3588> ki- because ה֖וּא <WH1931> hu he בְּכ֣וֹר <WH1060> be-Chor for he [was] the firstborn יוֹסֵ֑ף <WH3130> yo-Sef; of Joseph לְמָכִיר֩ <WH4353> le-ma-Chir [to wit] for Machir בְּכ֨וֹר <WH1060> be-Chor the firstborn מְנַשֶּׁ֜ה <WH4519> me-nash-Sheh of Manasseh אֲבִ֣י <WH1> 'a-Vi the father הַגִּלְעָ֗ד <WH1568> hag-gil-'Ad, of Gilead כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki because ה֤וּא <WH1931> hu he הָיָה֙ <WH1961> ha-Yah were allotted אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> 'ish because he was a man מִלְחָמָ֔ה <WH4421> mil-cha-Mah, of war וַֽיְהִי־ <WH1961> vay-hi- were allotted ל֖וֹ lo הַגִּלְעָ֥ד <WH1568> hag-gil-'Ad therefore he had Gilead וְהַבָּשָֽׁן׃ <WH1316> ve-hab-ba-Shan. and Bashan

וַ֠יְהִי <WH1961> Vay-hi become לִבְנֵ֨י <WH1121> liv-Nei of the children מְנַשֶּׁ֥ה <WH4519> me-nash-Sheh of Manasseh הַנּוֹתָרִים֮ <WH3498> han-no-ta-Rim There was also [a lot] for the rest לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָם֒ <WH4940> le-mish-pe-cho-Tam by their families לִבְנֵ֨י <WH1121> liv-Nei for the children אֲבִיעֶ֜זֶר <WH44> 'a-vi-'E-zer of Abiezer וְלִבְנֵי־ <WH1121> ve-liv-nei- and for the children חֵ֗לֶק <WH2507> Che-lek, of Helek וְלִבְנֵ֤י <WH1121> ve-liv-Nei and for the children אַשְׂרִיאֵל֙ <WH844> 'as-ri-'El of Asriel וְלִבְנֵי־ <WH1121> ve-liv-nei- and for the children שֶׁ֔כֶם <WH7928> She-chem, of Shechem וְלִבְנֵי־ <WH1121> ve-liv-nei- and for the children חֵ֖פֶר <WH2660> Che-fer of Hepher וְלִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> ve-liv-Nei and for the children שְׁמִידָ֑ע <WH8061> she-mi-Da'; of Shemida אֵ֠לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh these בְּנֵ֨י <WH1121> be-Nei children מְנַשֶּׁ֧ה <WH4519> me-nash-Sheh of Manasseh בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son יוֹסֵ֛ף <WH3130> yo-Sef of Joseph הַזְּכָרִ֖ים <WH2145> haz-ze-cha-Rim these [were] the male לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָֽם׃ <WH4940> le-mish-pe-cho-Tam. by their families

וְלִצְלָפְחָד֩ <WH6765> ve-litz-la-fe-Chad But Zelophehad בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son חֵ֨פֶר <WH2660> Che-fer of Hepher בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son גִּלְעָ֜ד <WH1568> gil-'Ad of Gilead בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son מָכִ֣יר <WH4353> ma-Chir of Machir בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son מְנַשֶּׁ֗ה <WH4519> me-nash-Sheh, of Manasseh לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- no הָ֥יוּ <WH1961> Ha-yu had ל֛וֹ lo בָּנִ֖ים <WH1121> ba-Nim had no sons כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki for אִם־ <WH518> 'im- lo בָּנ֑וֹת <WH1323> ba-Not; but daughters וְאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <WH428> ve-'El-leh and these שְׁמ֣וֹת <WH8034> she-Mot and these [are] the names בְּנֹתָ֔יו <WH1323> be-no-Tav, of his daughters מַחְלָ֣ה <WH4244> mach-Lah Mahlah וְנֹעָ֔ה <WH5270> ve-no-'Ah, and Noah חָגְלָ֥ה <WH2295> cha-ge-Lah Hoglah מִלְכָּ֖ה <WH4435> mil-Kah Milcah וְתִרְצָֽה׃ <WH8656> ve-tir-Tzah. and Tirzah

וַתִּקְרַ֡בְנָה <WH7126> vat-tik-Rav-nah And they came near לִפְנֵי֩ <WH6440> lif-Nei before אֶלְעָזָ֨ר <WH499> 'el-'a-Zar Eleazar הַכֹּהֵ֜ן <WH3548> hak-ko-Hen the priest וְלִפְנֵ֣י׀ <WH6440> ve-lif-Nei and before יְהוֹשֻׁ֣עַ <WH3091> ye-ho-Shu-a' Joshua בִּן־ <WH1121> bin- the son נ֗וּן <WH5126> Nun, of Nun וְלִפְנֵ֤י <WH6440> ve-lif-Nei and before הַנְּשִׂיאִים֙ <WH5387> han-ne-si-'Im the princes לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> le-Mor, saying יְהוָה֙ <WH3069> Yah-weh God צִוָּ֣ה <WH6680> tziv-Vah commanded אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh, Moses לָֽתֶת־ <WH5414> la-tet- to give לָ֥נוּ La-nu נַחֲלָ֖ה <WH5159> na-cha-Lah us an inheritance בְּת֣וֹךְ <WH8432> be-Toch among אַחֵ֑ינוּ <WH251> 'a-Chei-nu; our brethren וַיִּתֵּ֨ן <WH5414> vai-yit-Ten he gave לָהֶ֜ם la-Hem אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- according פִּ֤י <WH6310> pi Therefore according to the commandment יְהוָה֙ <WH3069> Yah-weh God נַֽחֲלָ֔ה <WH5159> na-cha-Lah, them an inheritance בְּת֖וֹךְ <WH8432> be-Toch among אֲחֵ֥י <WH251> 'a-Chei the brethren אֲבִיהֶֽן׃ <WH1> 'a-vi-Hen. of their father

וַיִּפְּל֥וּ <WH5307> vai-yip-pe-Lu And there fell חַבְלֵֽי־ <WH2256> chav-lei- portions מְנַשֶּׁ֖ה <WH4519> me-nash-Sheh to Manasseh עֲשָׂרָ֑ה <WH6235> 'a-sa-Rah; ten לְבַ֞ד <WH905> le-Vad alone מֵאֶ֤רֶץ <WH776> me-'E-retz beside the land הַגִּלְעָד֙ <WH1568> hag-gil-'Ad of Gilead וְהַבָּשָׁ֔ן <WH1316> ve-hab-ba-Shan, and Bashan אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which מֵעֵ֥בֶר <WH5676> me-'E-ver which [were] on the other side לַיַּרְדֵּֽן׃ <WH3383> lai-yar-Den. Jordan

כִּ֚י <WH3588> ki because בְּנ֣וֹת <WH1323> be-Not Because the daughters מְנַשֶּׁ֔ה <WH4519> me-nash-Sheh, of Manasseh נָחֲל֥וּ <WH5157> na-cha-Lu had נַחֲלָ֖ה <WH5159> na-cha-Lah an inheritance בְּת֣וֹךְ <WH8432> be-Toch among בָּנָ֑יו <WH1121> ba-Nav; his sons וְאֶ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> ve-'E-retz had the land הַגִּלְעָ֔ד <WH1568> hag-gil-'Ad, of Gilead הָיְתָ֥ה <WH1961> ha-ye-Tah belonged לִבְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> liv-nei- sons מְנַשֶּׁ֖ה <WH4519> me-nash-Sheh of Manasseh's הַנּֽוֹתָרִֽים׃ <WH3498> han-No-ta-Rim. and the rest

וַיְהִ֤י <WH1961> vay-Hi ran גְבוּל־ <WH1366> ge-Vul And the coast מְנַשֶּׁה֙ <WH4519> me-nash-Sheh of Manasseh מֵֽאָשֵׁ֔ר <WH836> me-'a-Sher, was from Asher הַֽמִּכְמְתָ֔ת <WH4366> ham-mich-me-Tat, to Michmethah אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- that פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> pe-Nei that [lieth] before שְׁכֶ֑ם <WH7927> she-Chem; Shechem וְהָלַ֤ךְ <WH1980> ve-ha-Lach went along הַגְּבוּל֙ <WH1366> hag-ge-Vul and the border אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about הַיָּמִ֔ין <WH3225> hai-ya-Min, on the right hand אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to יֹשְׁבֵ֖י <WH3427> yo-she-Vei unto the inhabitants עֵ֥ין 'ein תַּפּֽוּחַ׃ <WH5887> tap-Pu-ach. of Entappuah

לִמְנַשֶּׁ֕ה <WH4519> lim-nash-Sheh [Now] Manasseh הָיְתָ֖ה <WH1961> ha-ye-Tah belonged אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> 'E-retz had the land תַּפּ֑וּחַ <WH8599> tap-Pu-ach; of Tappuah וְתַפּ֛וּחַ <WH8599> ve-tap-Pu-ach but Tappuah אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- on גְּב֥וּל <WH1366> ge-Vul on the border מְנַשֶּׁ֖ה <WH4519> me-nash-Sheh of Manasseh לִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> liv-Nei [belonged] to the children אֶפְרָֽיִם׃ <WH669> 'ef-Ra-yim. of Ephraim

וְיָרַ֣ד <WH3381> ve-ya-Rad descended הַגְּבוּל֩ <WH1366> hag-ge-Vul And the coast נַ֨חַל <WH5158> Na-chal unto the river קָנָ֜ה <WH7071> ka-Nah Kanah נֶ֣גְבָּה <WH5045> Neg-bah southward לַנַּ֗חַל <WH5158> lan-Na-chal, of the river עָרִ֤ים <WH5892> 'a-Rim these cities הָאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <WH428> ha-'El-leh לְאֶפְרַ֔יִם <WH669> le-'ef-Ra-yim, of Ephraim בְּת֖וֹךְ <WH8432> be-Toch [are] among עָרֵ֣י <WH5892> 'a-Rei the cities מְנַשֶּׁ֑ה <WH4519> me-nash-Sheh; of Manasseh וּגְב֤וּל <WH1366> u-ge-Vul the coast מְנַשֶּׁה֙ <WH4519> me-nash-Sheh of Manasseh מִצְּפ֣וֹן <WH6828> mitz-tze-Fon also [was] on the north side לַנַּ֔חַל <WH5158> lan-Na-chal, of the river וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> vay-Hi become תֹצְאֹתָ֖יו <WH8444> to-tze-'o-Tav and the outgoings הַיָּֽמָּה׃ <WH3220> hai-Yam-mah. of it were at the sea

נֶ֣גְבָּה <WH5045> Neg-bah Southward לְאֶפְרַ֗יִם <WH669> le-'ef-Ra-yim, [it was] Ephraim's וְצָפ֙וֹנָה֙ <WH6828> ve-tza-Fo-nah and northward לִמְנַשֶּׁ֔ה <WH4519> lim-nash-Sheh, [it was] Manasseh's וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> vay-Hi become הַיָּ֖ם <WH3220> hai-Yam and the sea גְּבוּל֑וֹ <WH1366> ge-vu-Lo; is his border וּבְאָשֵׁר֙ <WH836> u-ve-'a-Sher in Asher יִפְגְּע֣וּן <WH6293> yif-ge-'Un and they met together מִצָּפ֔וֹן <WH6828> mitz-tza-Fon, on the north וּבְיִשָּׂשכָ֖ר <WH3485> u-ve-yis-so-sh-Char and in Issachar מִמִּזְרָֽח׃ <WH4217> mi-miz-Rach. on the east

וַיְהִ֨י <WH1961> vay-Hi had לִמְנַשֶּׁ֜ה <WH4519> lim-nash-Sheh And Manasseh בְּיִשָּׂשכָ֣ר <WH3485> be-yis-so-sh-Char had in Issachar וּבְאָשֵׁ֗ר <WH836> u-ve-'a-Sher, and in Asher בֵּית־ beit- שְׁאָ֣ן <WH1052> she-'An Bethshean וּ֠בְנוֹתֶיהָ <WH1323> U-ve-no-tei-ha and her towns וְיִבְלְעָ֨ם <WH2991> ve-yiv-le-'Am and Ibleam וּבְנוֹתֶ֜יהָ <WH1323> u-ve-no-Tei-ha and her towns וְֽאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et יֹשְׁבֵ֧י <WH3427> yo-she-Vei and the inhabitants דֹ֣אר <WH1756> dor of Dor וּבְנוֹתֶ֗יהָ <WH1323> u-ve-no-Tei-ha, and her towns וְיֹשְׁבֵ֤י <WH3427> ve-yo-she-Vei and the inhabitants עֵֽין־ 'ein- דֹּר֙ <WH5874> dor of Endor וּבְנֹתֶ֔יהָ <WH1323> u-ve-no-Tei-ha, and her towns וְיֹשְׁבֵ֤י <WH3427> ve-yo-she-Vei and the inhabitants תַעְנַךְ֙ <WH8590> ta'-naCh of Taanach וּבְנֹתֶ֔יהָ <WH1323> u-ve-no-Tei-ha, and her towns וְיֹשְׁבֵ֥י <WH3427> ve-yo-she-Vei and the inhabitants מְגִדּ֖וֹ <WH4023> me-gid-Do of Megiddo וּבְנוֹתֶ֑יהָ <WH1323> u-ve-no-Tei-ha; and her towns שְׁלֹ֖שֶׁת <WH7969> she-Lo-shet [even] three הַנָּֽפֶת׃ <WH5316> han-Na-fet. countries

וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> ve-Lo not יָכְלוּ֙ <WH3201> ya-che-Lu could בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei Yet the children מְנַשֶּׁ֔ה <WH4519> me-nash-Sheh, of Manasseh לְהוֹרִ֖ישׁ <WH3423> le-ho-Rish not drive out אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הֶֽעָרִ֣ים <WH5892> he-'a-Rim [the inhabitants of] those cities הָאֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> ha-'El-leh; of these וַיּ֙וֹאֶל֙ <WH2974> vai-Yo-'el would הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֔י <WH3669> hak-ke-na-'a-Ni, but the Canaanites לָשֶׁ֖בֶת <WH3427> la-She-vet dwell בָּאָ֥רֶץ <WH776> ba-'A-retz in that land הַזֹּֽאת׃ <WH2063> haz-Zot. It

וַֽיְהִ֗י <WH1961> vay-Hi, came כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki when חָֽזְקוּ֙ <WH2388> cha-ze-Ku were waxen strong בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei Yet it came to pass when the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel וַיִּתְּנ֥וּ <WH5414> vai-yit-te-Nu that they put אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֖י <WH3669> hak-ke-na-'a-Ni the Canaanites לָמַ֑ס <WH4522> la-Mas; to tribute וְהוֹרֵ֖שׁ <WH3423> ve-ho-Resh but did not utterly לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo out הוֹרִישֽׁוֹ׃ <WH3423> ho-ri-Sho. drive them out ס sa-Mek

וַֽיְדַבְּרוּ֙ <WH1696> vay-dab-be-Ru spake בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei And the children יוֹסֵ֔ף <WH3130> yo-Sef, of Joseph אֶת־ <WH854> 'et- for יְהוֹשֻׁ֖עַ <WH3091> ye-ho-Shu-a' unto Joshua לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> le-Mor; saying מַדּוּעַ֩ <WH4069> mad-du-a' Why נָתַ֨תָּה <WH5414> na-Tat-tah Why hast thou given לִּ֜י li נַחֲלָ֗ה <WH5159> na-cha-Lah, to inherit גּוֹרָ֤ל <WH1486> go-Ral lot אֶחָד֙ <WH259> 'e-Chad me [but] one וְחֶ֣בֶל <WH2256> ve-Che-vel portion אֶחָ֔ד <WH259> 'e-Chad, and one וַֽאֲנִ֣י <WH589> va-'a-Ni I עַם־ <WH5971> 'am- people רָ֔ב <WH7227> Rav, seeing I [am] a great עַ֥ד <WH5704> 'ad forasmuch as אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- whom עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- far כֹּ֖ה <WH3541> koh has thus בֵּֽרְכַ֥נִי <WH1288> be-re-Cha-ni hath blessed יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. the LORD

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer answered אֲלֵיהֶ֜ם <WH413> 'a-lei-Hem about יְהוֹשֻׁ֗עַ <WH3091> ye-ho-Shu-a', And Joshua אִם־ <WH518> 'im- If עַם־ <WH5971> 'am- people רַ֤ב <WH7227> rav them If thou [be] a great אַתָּה֙ <WH859> 'at-Tah you עֲלֵ֣ה <WH5927> 'a-Leh [then] get thee up לְךָ֣ le-Cha הַיַּ֔עְרָה <WH3293> hai-Ya'-rah, to the wood וּבֵרֵאתָ֤ <WH1254> u-ve-re-Ta [country] and cut down לְךָ֙ le-Cha שָׁ֔ם <WH8033> Sham, there בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> be-'E-retz for thyself there in the land הַפְּרִזִּ֖י <WH6522> hap-pe-riz-Zi of the Perizzites וְהָֽרְפָאִ֑ים <WH7497> ve-ha-re-fa-'Im; and of the giants כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- since אָ֥ץ <WH213> 'atz be too narrow לְךָ֖ le-Cha הַר־ <WH2022> har- if mount אֶפְרָֽיִם׃ <WH669> 'ef-Ra-yim.
